589180.name: Defuser VR
589180.description:
Defuser VR is an easy to pickup bomb defusing game set against the clock.

1) Choose how many bombs you think you can defuse (only start with 5 or 6 for your first game!)
2) Flip the bombs to their green side to stop their timer
3) Watch out, if you let a bomb go off, it could knock over your defused bomb, restarting its timer!

  • Choose how many bombs to challenge yourself with and try to beat your high-score.
  • Height adjustable play surface, just grab the handle to choose your play height.
  • Toggle music on/off

V A P O R W A V E --- A E S T H E T I C
